item.description: PLEASE READ CAREFULLY! THIS IS A JOINT MEETUP. A fantastic game to watch! www.pawsox.com I bought 8 tickets. They are in Section 6 Red Seats second level behind home plate! I am in Row BB (2nd row) Seats 5-8 and the ones up for grabs are in Row CC (3rd Row) Seats 5-8. How cool is that! And to boot the tickets are only $11 each plus $2 to park. Very limited free parking near the stadium. And yes I said only $2 to park. UNBELIEVABLE! But it is true! I remember going to a game and it turned out it was just before Ellsbury and Paplebon got called up to Boston. Who will be next? Could be someone from this game. You never know :) HOW TO GET TICKETS: RSVP yes. Then send me an email to see if the tickets are still available. (I have this posted to 3 meetup groups). If I email you back with a yes, then you must PROMPTLY send me a check or money order for the tickets. Chris Lorant PO Box 3581 Edgartown, MA 02539-3581. They are face value. I am eating the cost of the service charge. I will in turn mail you the tickets. FAILURE TO DO SO WILL RESULT IN ME CHANGING YOUR RSVP TO A NO AND REOPENING THE RSVP TO OTHERS. SORRY TO BE THIS WAY, BUT I HAVE GOTTEN STIFFED ONE TO MANY TIMES. THE FIRST 3,000 FEMALES TO ENTER THE PARK GET A FREE T-SHIRT. Park opens 2 hours before game time. We will meet at our seats.
item.name: Paw Sox/Yankee Tickets!
